resources.string: We did not find available application usage information, it may be because you did not grant us the permission to obtain it. We hereby promise that the software does not have any networking function, and will not upload or collect any of your application usage information. The information granted by the permission is only used for wallpaper generation and local display of application usage.
Welcome to LUSW \n (Lollipop usage stats wallpaper) \n Here is a brief introduction to how the application is used:
Here you can set the corresponding color for each application separately
Here, you can configure the colors you like, and you can also set up a nice name for them
Here you can adjust some additional preferences, and you can also learn about the author’s information
When you don’t know what to do, you can click this button, it will give you some tips
Here, you can adjust the color you like. \nThe following is a brief introduction to how to use it:
You can add colors by clicking on it
You can click on the color card to adjust the color or its name
You can also press and hold the color card to trigger the drag sort, and rearrange the number for the color you like
You can also slide the color card to the screen or outside of the card to remove a color card.
Here, you can associate a color you like for each application. \nThe following is a brief introduction to how to use it:
It can help you switch the exchange mode, in the exchange mode, you can easily switch colors for each application
It can help you switch the build mode, in the build mode, you can quickly specify the color for the application
You can quickly set LUSW as your wallpaper through it. If you can’t find LSUW on the wallpaper setting page of the system, then it may help you
After closing, the wallpaper will not show transition effects when it appears. But this will not save you power.
